topic: as venezuela buckles under trump, iran sees an uncomfortable parallel

text: Venezuela is facing severe shortages of food, medicine, and other essential goods
Iran is dealing with high inflation and a struggling economy
The United States has imposed economic sanctions on both countries
The Trump administration introduced sanctions on Venezuela in 2019
The US has imposed various sanctions on Iran since 1979
The sanctions have had a significant impact on the economies of both countries
Widespread poverty and shortages of essential goods are reported in Venezuela
High prices and limited access to goods are reported in Iran
The sanctions limit the ability of both countries to access international markets
The sanctions also limit the ability of both countries to access finance
Both countries are facing significant economic challenges
Both countries are facing significant challenges in providing for their citizens
The US policy of imposing sanctions has had a significant impact on both countries
The economic sanctions have significant global implications
